summary: After the horrible terrorist attacks that rocked Paris, this daring investigation thriller plunges you inside the extremist muslim groups that grow inside western countries and can strike at any moment.
cast: Malik Zidi|Dimitri Storoge|François Civil|Nassim Lyes|Ahmed Dramé|Nailia Harzoune|Nicolas Grandhomme|Assaad Bouab|Malek Oudjail|Laurent Alexandre|Franck Gastambide|Judith Davis|Tidjo Grand|Emilie Parvillers|David Serero
title: Objetivo: París
